short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract color palettes from any website, analyze colors for accessibility, and create custom palettes with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Website Color Palette Extractor & Analyzer is your go-to Chrome extension for capturing and analyzing the color palettes of any website. Built for designers, developers, and color enthusiasts, it provides an instant breakdown of the hues, and color codes used in web design. 

Features:

Extract complete color palettes from any website in one click.
Get HEX, RGB, HSL, and other color formats.
Download as JSON and png format.
